transcript: 44-year-old male assault victim with head injury and facial trauma. Patient is conscious and alert. Head injury with possible concussion. Multiple facial lacerations and contusions. Blood pressure is 115/75. Heart rate is 95. Need trauma consult for assault head injury.
activation_page: Trauma consult for 44-year-old male assault victim with head injury and facial trauma. Patient conscious, stable vitals. Trauma team consultation required.
